title: Saving Our Country Is a Dirty Job | Guest: Mike Rowe | 2/22/22
description:
Glenn starts off the show discussing Vladimir Putin’s speech regarding Ukraine and points out a threat against Biden nobody is talking about. Pat Gray joins Glenn and Stu to discuss Russia, Canada, and alternative food sources. Glenn dives more into Canada’s use of the emergency powers act and how it can be used to manipulate the banks and currency. In honor of George Washington’s birthday, Glenn shares some lessons from Washington that can apply today in the fight for our country. Host of "The Way I Heard It" and "Dirty Jobs" Mike Rowe joins Glenn to discuss the current state of America regarding COVID and the unemployment rate and the ongoing Russia/Ukraine controversy.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
